name: Artoo
Lore: 'Counterpart to C-3PO. Spy. Obstinate, headstrong and always full of surprises. R2-D2 was an integral part of Luke Skywalker''s rescue plans.',
Text: 'During each of your control phases, may take one Hero Of A Thousand Devices or A Gift into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. If at a battleground site with C-3P0, may subtract 1 from each opponent''s battle destiny at same and related sites.',
